content.rendered:
How It Works

We make home
interiors a breeze!

How
it Works

Meet your designer

Designer visits the site/meet you and understand all your requirements related to your home and answer all your doubts.

Get your tentative design and home planning

Once designers segregates your requirements and your taste for your home, they will provide you a tentative presentation and planning of your home, so it will be easy for you to understand how it will look.

Get your quote that fits in your budget

After the brief discussion of your home the designer will share you the quote according to the design chosen by you that fits in your budget.

Place order

Once you are satisfied and happy with the design and your budget fits in the quote then place your order with 5% locking amount.

Finalization drawings and designs

And now the crucial and the most important step to design your dream home comes, finalize your drawings so that your project gets ready to start.

Site work starts

After finalizing your designs and materials now it comes to the first step towards your dream home, your site work will get started according to designs and material finalization

Production phase

Now the production phase starts in our own factory for your order with your chosen quality and material

Execution and installation

The manufacturing of your order is nearly done and now it’s good to go on your site and get installed as per design after this final step the handover is just in its final phase.

Handover

And what’s now, your dream home is ready to handover only some petty changes and cleaning and your beautiful home is ready !!

Move in

Now you can see your dream home in reality and you are ready to move in and live your dream with your beautiful home.

Connect with the Best
Interior Designers In Your City,
Enquire Now

Latest News & Updates

Follow the latest news

Collective Living Challenge In modern design

Interior

Interior

Interior

Get closer to your dream home
